Island.Description: Select when Echo Reef can be accessed from Ginger Island.

Beach.Description: Select whether or not Echo Reef can be accessed from the beach.

RichieFarmland.Description: Select whether or not Echo Reef can be accessed from Richie's farmland (If the Richie mod is downloaded).
